title: Drawing, "The boy home from Military School", ca. 1940
medium: Pen and black ink on paper
description: Boy in uniform of military school being looked at by his former playmates. Two boys look at him disdainfully while half-grown girl admires him.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The boy home from Military School", ca. 1940.
ca. 1940. Pen and black ink on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-15.
